string.text: Can I help you?
That depends on what you're doing here. Or what you're looking for. Or maybe you've already found it? The Zone is full of surprises...
Sorry, I'm not at liberty to say
Well, I can see you're eager to get away. So did you find what you were looking for? I'm also looking for something
Well, if I had found anything, it'd be my business...
Yes, I found the missing documents from X-18. The Barkeep promised to pay well for them
Sorry, I didn't find anything
I don't really know why I bothered coming here. I just want to get out...
And you're sure you didn't find anything of interest? I've heard that you can find documented evidence on experiments that were carried out here. And get paid handsomely for it...
No, I didn't find anything
Are you sure? You're not hiding anything from me?
No
Why so many questions?
Are you threatening me?
Fuck whatever's in there! I barely made it out alive!
Well, leave if you want. But I won't be far behind you...

Listen, buddy, I'm a bounty hunter of the Zone. I've survived radiation, mutants, anomalies, and people constantly trying to kill me - and I always get who or what I'm looking for! I came for the documents here, and I'm not leaving without them. If you have them, then I advise you to hand them over, otherwise you'll stay in this hole forever! Am I making myself clear?
Yes, very clear
If you're lying to me - you'll wish you hadn't. I'll ask you again - did you find any documents?
That's good, so next time think carefully before answering. Now go. I can always find you
Our conversation's over. Just get out of my way
I don't have any documents
That's better. Now give me everything you found. All the documents. And if you try to hide anything, it'll be the last thing you do...
Wait, I'll tell you! I just want to get out of here. Yes, I found them. I'll share them with you...
I've nothing to share
That's good... but don't play games with me, okay?
Are you threatening me?
Hey! Calm down... You're the one holding the gun! No more questions. I'm just advising you to be careful, that's all
I only want the documents. Tell me where they are, and I'll let you go. Do you understand me?
Come on, say something

Listen, buddy, stop messing me about and let's get this over with. I could kill you, but that wouldn't help either of us. I just want those documents. Then you're free to go. But I can't let you go until I have them...
Listen, I really need these documents. Can we come to an agreement?
There's nothing here, except fucking Burers. I wish I'd never come here
Feel free to leave, Stalker. Go your own way
Look, I came here for those documents. If you found something, then tell me. Otherwise we're just going to carry on like this. If you didn't find them, then stop wasting my time!
Look, just give me the papers, unless you want to stay here forever!
I'll think about it...
